jobInfo.Jobdescription:
Must Have Skills: -

• 4-6 Years of Experience in Salesforce and Vlocity using Omni Script, Card UI Framework, Data Raptor, Process Libraries Well versed with Vlocity Out of the box features and functionality.

• Hands-on experience building Lightning Components Hands-on experience using DevOps continuous integration and good understanding of working in Scrum teams following Agile methodology.

• Highly skilled with designing, developing, and implementing solutions using Salesforce including Sales, Service Cloud.

• Software Engineering qualification.

• Visualforce, Apex, SOQL.

• BitBucket, Jenkins, Jira, Confluence.


Good To have Skill:-

• Salesforce APIs & Integration experience.

• CI/CD implementation.

• Strong Java & other Tech Stack experience.


Insurance Domain working experience is essential
